content.en: SSTI Treatment Advances: Scientists have conducted various studies to address the management and treatment of skin and soft tissue infections (SSTIs). These studies have explored the effectiveness of treatment algorithms, the impact of multidisciplinary care bundles, and the role of antimicrobial stewardship programs. Algorithms have been attributed agency in risk assessment, treatment facilitation, management, and treatment intervention. However, some research questions do not specifically attribute agency to algorithms. Overall, these studies aim to improve patient outcomes and reduce inappropriate antibiotic use through evidence-based algorithms and interventions.
content.da: Fremskridt i behandlingen af SSTI: Forskere har udført forskellige studier for at adressere håndtering og behandling af hud- og bløddelsinfektioner (SSTI). Disse studier har udforsket effektiviteten af behandlingsalgoritmer, virkningen af tværfaglige plejesæt og rollen af programmer for antimikrobiel styring. Algoritmer er blevet tilskrevet agency i risikovurdering, behandlingsfacilitering, håndtering og behandlingsintervention. Dog tilskriver nogle forskningsspørgsmål ikke specifikt algoritmer agency. Overordnet stræber disse studier efter at forbedre patientresultaterne og reducere upassende antibiotikabrug gennem evidensbaserede algoritmer og interventioner.
